root.name: Steel Panthers III: Brigade Command (1939-1999)
root.description: OverviewSteel Panthers III was developed by Gary Grigsby and Keith Brors and was released on PC DOS CD-ROM in 1997. The game included 6 campaign games and a Campaign Generator which generated a random campaign against a series of opponents. The campaigns ranged from historical to fictional and included: North Africa 1941-42, Stalingrad 1942, Market Garden 1944, Vietnam 1964-71, NATO 1988 and Holy War 2000. The game is a traditional, hex-based tactical level wargame with Play by Email (PBEM) capabilities.
